/item/list: Returns a list of all items in the database.
/item/:id: Returns basic information about a single item.
/item/:id/attributes: Returns extensive information about an item.
/item/:id/skills: Returns the prerequisite skills for an item.
/market/tree: Returns the entire market tree as one object.
/market/path/:id: Returns the path from a leaf market section back to the root market folder.
